headline: The Mosis â€” The Bringer of Flame (Prometheus)
description: In the Mosis, Sandr descends to a chamber of water and fire and meets Prometheusâ€”the sacred rebel who carries flame not for pride but for empathy. The gift is not a weapon but a grammar: learn the language of the fire, bear it without domination, and return with conscience burning quiet beneath the skin.
author: UNNAMED (Agnitio/Sandr cycle)
